i18n.key: List of parameters that can be used in the body and subject of the notification message. They must be between curly brackets and will be replaced by the corresponding value.
Notification email body. It may contain various proposed parameters between curly brackets.
Code name used by the system to identify the notification.
Description visible in the notification summary tab to describe its usage context.
This is the name used for display in the tree views.
Defines the full email address of the notification sender. Leave empty to use the default value.
Defines the name of the notification sender. Leave empty to use the default value.
Subject of the notification email. It can contain the various proposed parameters between curly brackets.
